name: Frogs can Fly
description:
The biggest dream of every frog is to fly. The rumour goes that behind the seven mountains, a dozen of ponds and several tricky levels, a Rainbow Unicorn lives which can make this dream comes true. But who will carry small frogs in this long and dangerous journey?

Stem Greenlight campaign

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=893925986


Digital Rubbish Manufacture

presents

Frogs can Fly

a game about jumping and flying


How to play

  • Jump forward – left mouse button, up arrow, W.
  • Jump backward (easy mode) – right mouse button, down arrow, S. (Jumping with L/R mouse buttons can be reversed.)
  • Change the jumping frog – mouse wheel, left/right arrows, A/D, or just point with a cursor.
  • Open in-game menu – middle mouse button, ESC, X.
  • Menu selection – W/S/space, up/down/enter, or mouse.


Features

Play modes:

  • - Normal. Just jump forth. But beware, do not left behind any frog.
  • - Easy. Jumping back is also allowed.
  • - Hard. The world is passing by. (Not in demo.)

Controller: steam version will fully support a game controller.

Steam integration: achievements, cloud, rankings, cards.

OS: Windows, Mac, Linux.


Assets used

Music:

Darren Curtis, soundcloud.com/desperate-measurez/sets/rpg-royalty-free-music, desperatemeasurez@yahoo.com

Fonts:

  • 'Emilys Candy' by Font Diner, www.1001fonts.com/emilys-candy-font.html,
  • 'Gwibble' by vin, www.1001fonts.com/gwibble-font.html,
  • 'FroggyPrincess' by Fabien Despinoy, www.1001fonts.com/froggyprincess-font.html,
  • 'Magnolia Script' by Tanya Cherkiz, www.1001fonts.com/magnolia-script-font.html,

  • sjnewton, www.freesound.org/people/sjnewton/sounds/256570/
